    1: from datetime import datetime
    2: 
    3: import pytz
    4: 
    5: from pandas import DataFrame
    6: import pandas._testing as tm
    7: 
    8: 
    9: class TestDataFrameAlterAxes:
   10:     # Tests for setting index/columns attributes directly (i.e. __setattr__)
   11: 
   12:     def test_set_axis_setattr_index(self):
   13:         # GH 6785
   14:         # set the index manually
   15: 
   16:         df = DataFrame([{"ts": datetime(2014, 4, 1, tzinfo=pytz.utc), "foo": 1}])
   17:         expected = df.set_index("ts")
   18:         df.index = df["ts"]
   19:         df.pop("ts")
   20:         tm.assert_frame_equal(df, expected)
   21: 
   22:     # Renaming
   23: 
   24:     def test_assign_columns(self, float_frame):
   25:         float_frame["hi"] = "there"
   26: 
   27:         df = float_frame.copy()
   28:         df.columns = ["foo", "bar", "baz", "quux", "foo2"]
   29:         tm.assert_series_equal(float_frame["C"], df["baz"], check_names=False)
   30:         tm.assert_series_equal(float_frame["hi"], df["foo2"], check_names=False)
